gw.solr

Class AbstractSolrSearchPlugin

  • gw.solr.AbstractSolrSearchPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject, InitializablePlugin

    public class AbstractSolrSearchPlugin
implements InitializablePlugin, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Base class for a Solr search plugin. This type of plugin handles creating and submitting Solr queries.
